text: In some cases, data may still be collected about your browsing activity by these third-party advertisers, but they will not use this data to deliver advertisements that are based on your past online browsing behaviour.

Where you have given your consent, Freddie Med may store your business contact details for direct marketing purposes and we may contact you about our respective products or services that may be of interest to you or your employer.
We may also collect other information that you provide to us through using our Website.

As a general rule, we keep your personal information for as long as required (a) to comply with law; (b) in connection with legal action or an investigation involving us; or (c) to provide you with information, access to the Website, or our products and our services.
